view module¶

class view.View(app, search, views, results, hasCalma, searchLayout)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class defines a data view of a SPARQL query search.

add_tooltips()[source]¶
change_proportions()[source]¶

Adjusts the proportions of dialog given to each individual view.

This function is called whenever the user moves the sliders in the “Layout” tab, the sliders dictate the ratio between the view, e.g. 10:10:10 would give each an equal amount of space.

self : instance
Class instance.
change_to_results(index)[source]¶
change_to_search(index)[source]¶

Creates the layouts for the data view (the overall dialog).

self : instance
Class instance.

List of requested views.
create_search_properties_window()[source]¶

Creates a properties window for a data view.

self : instance
Class instance.
generate_map(results)[source]¶

Generates a map view for the SPARQL query results.

The map dialog utilizes a QWebEngineView, webkit-based, to display an OpenStreetMap tiles layer with the data placed on top.

self : instance
Class instance.
results : {}
The results of the SPARQL query.
generate_plot_view()[source]¶

Starts a new plot of CALMA data.

This function is typically called after CALMA data has been retrieved and a track has been clicked upon.

self : instance
Class instance.
